title: Angular Material Date Time Picker does not work with inline editing
body:
Can someone help me figure out what I am doing wrong here?

The below code is using a custom component for angular material to select Date and Time. I have got this from https://github.com/logbon72/angular-material-datetimepicker. It works fine in a normal form like below.

<div class="form-group required" flex="20">
  <md-input-container class="md-block">
     <input mdc-datetime-picker=""
     date="true"
     time="true"
     type="text"
     id="datetime"
     short-time="true"
     format="DD/MM/YY - hh:mm:ssa"
     placeholder="Date Time"
     show-todays-date=""
     min-date="date"
     ng-model="time"
     class="md-input">
  </md-input-container>
<div>

However, when I try to use it in inline editing in a table , in order to change the date time in an inline edit as below, It throws the following error "angular.js:12119 TypeError: Cannot read property 'year' of null"

Code for inline edit of date time picker.

<td class="inline-input-cell">
  <md-input-container class="md-block">
     <input mdc-datetime-picker=""
     date="true"
     time="true"
     type="text"
     id="datetime-1"
     short-time="true"
     format="DD/MM/YY - hh:mm:ssa"
     placeholder="Time"
     show-todays-date=""
     ng-model="time"
     class="md-input">
  </md-input-container>
</td>
